title: Slayer task/Rats

properties.name: description
properties.value: Rats can be assigned as a slayer task from Turael and Spria. They have no requirements to be assigned. There are a wide variety of rats that can count toward the task, but the most commonly killed are rats and giant rats, which are low-level, rarely deal damage, and practically ubiquitous. Brine rats are accessible during Olaf's Quest, and drop medium clues and the elusive brine sabre. Hell-rat behemoths can be accessed after Freeing Evil Dave, and drop full spice shakers for spicy stews. Crypt rat and giant crypt rat variations require completion of Priest in Peril for access to Morytania and may be slain by players for the higher Slayer experience reward or for changing their reward potential inside the Barrows minigame .

Advanced data
Icon IDNo

Rats can be assigned as a slayer task from Turael and Spria. They have no requirements to be assigned. There are a wide variety of rats that can count toward the task, but the most commonly killed are rats and giant rats, which are low-level, rarely deal damage, and practically ubiquitous. Brine rats are accessible during Olaf's Quest, and drop medium clues and the elusive brine sabre. Hell-rat behemoths can be accessed after Freeing Evil Dave, and drop full spice shakers for spicy stews. Crypt rat and giant crypt rat variations require completion of Priest in Peril for access to Morytania and may be slain by players for the higher Slayer experience reward or for changing their reward potential inside the Barrows minigame .


Monster Variants[edit | edit source]

Monster Combat level Slayer XP Locations Notes
Rat 1 2
  • In and around Lumbridge
  • Rimmington
  • Various other locations.
  • Commonly found near towns and large buildings.
Giant rat 3,6,26 5,10,25
  • Behind Lumbridge castle
  • Lumbridge Swamp
  • Stronghold of Security
  • Various other locations. See Giant rat for a complete list of locations and numbers.
Zombie rat 3 2
  • Melzar's Maze
  • Requires starting Dragon Slayer I.
Brine rat 70 50
  • Brine Rat Cavern
  • Requires Olaf's Quest to be started to access the cavern.
Hell-rat behemoth 7 15
  • Evil Dave's basement
  • Requires completion of Freeing Evil Dave to access.
Crypt rat 43 45
  • Barrows crypt
  • Requires Priest in Peril completion for access to Morytania.
Giant crypt rat 76 70
  • Barrows crypt
  • Requires Priest in Peril completion for access to Morytania.

Rats can be assigned as a [[slayer task]] from [[Turael]] and [[Spira|Spria]]. They have no requirements to be assigned. There are a wide variety of rats that can count toward the task, but the most commonly killed are [[rat]]s and [[giant rat]]s, which are low-level, rarely deal damage, and practically ubiquitous. [[Brine rat]]s are accessible during [[Olaf's Quest]], and drop [[medium clue]]s and the elusive [[brine sabre]]. [[Hell-rat behemoth]]s can be accessed after [[Freeing Evil Dave]], and drop full spice shakers for [[spicy stew]]s. [[Crypt rat]] and [[giant crypt rat]] variations require completion of [[Priest in Peril]] for access to [[Morytania]] and may be slain by players for the higher [[Slayer]] experience reward or for changing their reward potential inside the [[Barrows|Barrows minigame]] .
